title: Generator Paradox Map
description: Overlay showing solar vs generator ratio by district. Highlights wealthy areas hedging bets - installing both solar AND backup generators.

title: Electrification Equity Dashboard - Combined growth + energy analysis with district ratio visualization
Grid Stress Score Overlay
description: Stress = (EV_load + future_load) - (solar_generation + battery_capacity). Red zones = need infrastructure, Green zones = can absorb AI datacenter.

title: Build permit extraction pipeline with Ollama
Time Slider Animation
description: Animate permits over 2019-2024. Show electrification velocity - which neighborhoods are electrifying fastest.

title: Download llama3.1:70b model on ASUS box
Electrification Score Heatmap
description: Score per district/ZIP combining signals (solar, EV, battery, panel). Color gradient on map - green = high electrification, red = low.
